column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Hakoda says : " This bay leads directly to the outskirts of Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Destructive ?
#Text=Buoyant ?
#Text=And ... Aggh , ehhh !
#Text=Terrible smelling !
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Very perceptive .
#Text=The mines are filled with skunk fish and seaweed .
#Text=When a ship detonates the mine , the seaweed tangles up the propeller and the foul smell forces people to abandon the ship .
#Text=I call it the " stink and sink . "
#Text=" Sokka says : " Good one , Dad !
#Text=" Bato says : " You 're definitely your father 's son .
#Text=" Warrior says : " Hakoda , our scouts have spotted four Fire Nation ships !
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Bato , get these mines loaded up !
#Text=The rest of you men , prepare for battle !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Uhhh ... what should I do , Dad ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Are n't you listening ?
#Text=I said , " The rest of you men , get ready for battle " .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Who thought when we came to this city as refugees , that I 'd end up owning my own tea shop ?
#Text=Follow your passion , Zuko , and life will reward you .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Congratulations , Uncle .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I am very thankful .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You deserve it .
#Text=The Jasmine Dragon will be the best tea shop in the city .
#Text=" Iroh says : " No .
#Text=I 'm thankful because you decided to share this special day with me .
#Text=It means more than you know .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Now let 's make these people some tea !
#Text=" Iroh says : " Yes , let 's make some tea !
#Text=" Pathik says : " Third is the Fire Chakra , located in the stomach .
#Text=" Aang says : " My Fire Chakra would like to eat something other than onion - banana juice .
#Text=" Pathik says : " Good one !
#Text=Moving on .
#Text=This chakra deals with willpower , and is blocked by shame .
#Text=What are you ashamed of ?
#Text=What are your biggest disappointments in yourself ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm never going to firebend again .
#Text=I ca n't .
#Text=" Pathik says : " You will never find balance if you deny this part of your life .
#Text=You are the Avatar and therefore , you are a firebender .
#Text=Hmmm ... that chakra opened less like a flowing creek , and more like a ... burping bison .
#Text=" Aang says : " Tastes like onions and bananas , but strangely something else .
#Text=Pickles ?
#Text=" Mai says : " I 'm tired of wearing this girly disguise .
#Text=I do n't know how anyone could fight in this .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Maybe that 's why it was so easy to beat the Kyoshi Warriors and take their clothes .
#Text=" Mai says : " How much longer do we have to serve the Earth King ?
#Text=If I have to clean up one more pile of bear poop , I 'm going to throw up .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Princess Azula promised we would go back to the Fire Nation as soon as we captured the Avatar .
#Text=We just have to be patient .
#Text=" Mai says : " Shush up !
#Text=Do you want the whole palace to know we 're Fire Nation ?
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Sorry !
#Text=" Azula says : " Good work , girls .
#Text=I 'm sure the Dai Li will deliver the message .
#Text=" Pathik says : " The fourth chakra is located in the heart .
#Text=It deals with love and is blocked by grief .
#Text=Lay all your grief out in front of you .
#Text=" Pathik says : " You have indeed felt a great loss .
#Text=But love is a form of energy , and it swirls all around us .
#Text=The Air Nomads ' love for you has not left this world .
#Text=It is still inside of your heart , and is reborn in the form of new love .
#Text=" Pathik says : " Let the pain flow away .
#Text=Very good .
#Text=" Aang says : " Can I have some onion - banana juice , please ?
#Text=" Pathik says : " The fifth in the chain is the Sound Chakra , located in the throat .
#Text=It deals with truth and is blocked by lies .
#Text=The ones we tell ourselves .
#Text=" Katara ( flashback ) says : " Why did n't you tell us you were the Avatar ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Because I never wanted to be .
#Text=" Pathik says : " You can not lie about your own nature .
#Text=You must accept that you are the Avatar .
#Text=Very good , Aang .
#Text=You have opened the chakra of truth .
#Text=" Pathik says : " The sixth pool of energy is the light chakra , located in the center of the forehead .
#Text=It deals with insight and is blocked by illusion .
#Text=The greatest illusion of this world is the illusion of separation .
#Text=Things you think are separate and different are actually one in the same .
#Text=" Aang says : " Like the four nations .
#Text=" Pathik says : " Yes .
#Text=We are all one people , but we live as if divided .
#Text=" Aang says : " We 're all connected .
#Text=Everything is connected .
#Text=" Pathik says : " That 's right !
#Text=Even the separation of the four elements is an illusion .
#Text=If you open your mind , you will see that all the elements are one .
#Text=Four parts of the same whole .
#Text=Even metal is just a part of earth that has been purified and refined .
#Text=" Toph says : " Come on , metal .
#Text=Budge !
#Text=Wooo !
#Text=Toph , you rule .
#Text=" Katara says : " What do you say , Momo ?
#Text=A cup of tea before we get back to the king ?
#Text=Table for two , please .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Uncle !
#Text=I need two jasmine , one green , and one lychee !
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 'm brewing as fast as I can !
#Text="
